nodes.text: Techno Union Research and Development Wing
The Techno Union Research and Development Wing was a section of the Techno Union during the Clone Wars

This wing of the union was concerned with researching and developing new technologies during the Clone Wars. In 22 BBY, the organization sent a representative, Bunt Dantor, to attend a panel debate on the HoloNet News show A Galaxy Divided, where he discussed the possible nature and technologies behind the mysterious new CIS weapon.
